episodes.title: Tim Daly: Mr. Madam Secretary
episodes.author: NPR
episodes.summary: Madam Secretary's Tim Daly shares what it's like being in a show about the American government in our current political climate, and his friendship with Madeleine Albright.

episodes.title: Gillian Jacobs And Kate Micucci: Your Brain Is Not Enough
episodes.author: NPR
episodes.summary: Gillian Jacobs and Kate Micucci, stars of Mike Birbiglia's film Don't Think Twice, join Ophira Eisenberg to talk songwriting, scary improv moments, and Scooby-Doo monsters. This episode originally aired on August 5, 2016.

episodes.title: AMA Bonus: Roy Wood Jr. Rapid-Fire Questions
episodes.author: NPR
episodes.summary: Comedian Roy Wood Jr. answers a round of rapid-fire questions in this bonus that couldn't fit into our recent episode. Find out what Baskin-Robbins flavors Roy would advise against.

episodes.title: Roy Wood Jr.: Puzzle Banger After Banger
episodes.author: NPR
episodes.summary: Comedian and Daily Show correspondent Roy Wood Jr. shares the struggles of raising his son in a world with racism and $9 smoothies. Then we quiz him on his favorite pastime—jigsaw puzzles!

episodes.title: Mike Rowe And NASA Scientists: Dirty Jobs In Spaaace!
episodes.author: NPR
episodes.summary: Ask Me Another travels to Orlando! We talk to Mike Rowe from Dirty Jobs about his own surprising career path. Plus, NASA scientists Gioia Massa and Melissa Jones dissect science in Hollywood films.

episodes.title: Kathleen Madigan: Life On The Road
episodes.author: NPR
episodes.summary: Comedian Kathleen Madigan talks about her Netflix special, 'Bothering Jesus,' then battles Lewis Black in a quiz about life on the road. Plus, returning contestants take a second shot at AMA glory!

episodes.title: Zazie Beetz: Atlanta In Brooklyn
episodes.author: NPR
episodes.summary: Zazie Beetz shares her theories as to why FX's Golden Globe-winning series "Atlanta" resonated with fans and critics in its first season. Plus, our Mystery Guest has a hobby that most women do not.

episodes.title: Eugene Mirman: Burger On A Sesame Seed Pun
episodes.author: NPR
episodes.summary: AMA goes back to school at Haverford College with all-student contestants! Plus, comedian Eugene Mirman, who graduated with a bachelor's degree in comedy, plays Burger of the Day—AMA style.

episodes.title: Cat Cora: Her Kitchen Rules
episodes.author: NPR
episodes.summary: Celebrity Chef Cat Cora dishes on her TV show "My Kitchen Rules" and the strange ways she kept her edge on "Iron Chef America." Plus, she guesses odd dishes made up of rhyming foods like "steak cake."

episodes.title: Connie Britton And Martina McBride: 'This One's For The Girls' (R)
episodes.author: NPR
episodes.summary: AMA heads to Nashville! NPR's Ann Powers gives us the inside scoop on Music City, musician Martina McBride talks about her writing process, and actor Connie Britton plays a game about famous TV moms.

episodes.title: Jeff Goldblum, Maika Monroe, 'Weird Al' Yankovic: 10 Out Of 10 Goldblums (R)
episodes.author: NPR
episodes.summary: AMA heads to Los Angeles! Jeff Goldblum and Maika Monroe from Independence Day: Resurgence discuss the challenges of acting with CGI aliens. Plus, "Weird Al" Yankovic parodies a David Bowie classic.

episodes.title: Leslie Odom Jr.: Aaron Burr, Sir (R)
episodes.author: NPR
episodes.summary: Broadway's Leslie Odom Jr., who played Aaron Burr in the hit musical Hamilton, joins us to talk about the show's meteoric rise and his path to Broadway as a high school student.

episodes.title: Tim Gunn: Make It Smirk!
episodes.author: NPR
episodes.summary: Author Jason Porath talks rebellious, unapologetic, and brave women in "Rejected Princesses." Then Project Runway's Tim Gunn helps us "make it work" in a game that rewrites his famous catchphrase.

episodes.title: Pablo Hidalgo: Red Five Standing By

episodes.title: Literary Favorites
episodes.author: NPR
episodes.summary: Why read books when you can play games about them? Join us as we revisit our favorite literary-themed games. Plus, a novel interview with author and actress Lauren Weedman. It's a real page turner!

episodes.title: Bob Boilen And Gaelynn Lea: What's In Your Tiny Desk? (R)
episodes.author: NPR
episodes.summary: NPR Music host Bob Boilen talks about the Tiny Desk Contest and winner Gaelynn Lea plays two of her songs. Then naturally the two play a game about things you find in a desk. This Episode originally aired June 3, 2016.

episodes.title: Cary Elwes, Dennis Quaid & Christian Cooke: The Art Of More

episodes.summary: Dennis Quaid and Christian Cooke from the Crackle series The Art Of More reveal their odd jobs and set mishaps. And co-star Cary Elwes tests his wits in a game inspired by The Princess Bride.

episodes.title: Brooklyn Decker: Two Truths And A Lie, Lie, Lie

episodes.title: Wyatt Cenac: Pop Culture Fights (R)

episodes.title: TV Favorites!
